headline: Tariffs, Trump, and Turmoil
summary: Motley Fool analyst Asit Sharma caught up with Martín de los Santos, the CFO of MercadoLibre, at The Motley Fool's Market Volatility Summit.  To catch full episodes of all The Motley Fool's free podcasts, check out our podcast center.  Should you invest $1,000 in MercadoLibre right now?

headline: What Makes Constellation Brands (STZ) an Investment Bet?
summary: Oakmark Funds, advised by Harris Associates, released its “Oakmark Fund” first quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The fund’s investor class returned 1.14% in the first quarter, compared to a -4.27% return for the S&P 500 Index. The fund has returned 12.76% since its inception compared to the index […]

headline: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent to America's biggest CEOs: Stop worrying
summary: CEOs have warned on the economy because of Trump administration tariff policies. US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent has a message for them all.

headline: Tariffs are coming for America’s favorite beer—but Modelo maker says it’s Trump’s immigration crackdown that’s hurting sales
summary: Constellation Brands warns that while new tariffs will raise costs, President Trump’s immigration crackdown is already driving down sales.

raw.headline: Tariffs are coming for America’s favorite beer—but Modelo maker says it’s Trump’s immigration crackdown that’s hurting sales

headline: 3 Stocks That Could Be Most Vulnerable to Tariffs
summary: The U.S. government has applied tariff rates globally, and it has increased, changed, and also made exceptions to them.  Three stocks that may be particularly vulnerable to tariffs are Constellation Brands (NYSE: STZ), PDD Holdings (NASDAQ: PDD), and e.l.f.  Beer maker Constellation Brands makes all of its beer in Mexico, and that's a problem, as the U.S. has imposed 25% tariffs on imported canned beer, which will weigh on Constellation's profitability.
